data.message: Yesterday 41 people were killed and dozens injured in terrorist attacks here in Beirut in the middle east, all of those who got killed were muslims, so please don't accuse muslims of being terrorists because that would be just plain wrong. We are all humans and we must stand together against terrorism, whether in the middle east or any other part of the world
